original_text: And Hiram sent with the fleet his servants, seamen who were familiar with the sea, together with the servants of Solomon.
korean_text: 히람이 자기 종 곧 바다에 익숙한 사공들을 솔로몬의 종과 함께 그 배로 보내매

sentences.original_text: And Hiram sent with the fleet his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 히람은 그의 종들을 함대와 함께 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: seamen who were familiar with the sea
together with the servants of Solomon
